title: Kinda Funny: The Animated Series - Ep. 4 Update!
description:
Subscribe: youtube.com/kindafunny

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

transcript_chunks.text: Hey everyone it's Nick uh I wanted to give you a quick update for what's happening with The Animated Series. Obviously uh we're working very very hard on episode 4, but we are slipping behind a little bit. Originally the goal was to hit one episode a month, but we've listened to your feedback - we're trying to make them a little longer, we're trying to make them a little more complex and introduce some of our friends as guests, and that's kind of slowing us down a little bit. Um so I apologize for that. The episode is coming; it should be here next week uh Dean is working his ass off um but he needs a little bit of help. So if you guys have noticed we've actually started doing some outreach uh to bring on some more animators. We've got two more animators on the hook, but I still want to get more people on if we can to help out with this series. So if you guys have any experience in Flash or you know anyone that does, shoot them over to KindaFunny.com submit um we'll take a look at their resume.

people on if we can to help out with this series so if you guys have any experience in Flash or you know anyone that does shoot them over to kindafunny.com submit um we'll take a look at their resume their portfolio and see if they're right for the job um but again apologies guys uh you know we we've been off a lot with this series you guys know it's always the standard garbage truck on fire and it wouldn't be a Kinda Funny production if everything didn't go wrong and it was ridiculous anyway um so episode is coming more fun stuff uh in in store for you guys in May uh hit me up on Twitter @Nick_Scarpino or leave a comment in this video uh with uh any comments you might have any any begrudging comments or anger or whatever shoot them at me I'll take them again apologies but it's coming soon Poland no Greg that's not Poland is just Poland
